ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: All Moreira professes to do is teach Cochrane's asset pricing course, so take it online from the guy himself: https://www.coursera.org/course/assetpricing .
Good course but draws on a lot of different material
Would recommend to finance PhD students.

Would recommend enthusiastically. Modern treatment of the material, lots of ideas for potential research projects. On occasion does require material first year students have typically not covered yet (welfare theorems, bit of time-series.)

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Great intro to the field. Especially the second half of the course

It provides good overview of asset pricing theories and relates to the current research on macro finance. I learned a lot from this course and it certainly helped me prepare for future research in finance.
